Small Academy Big Hearts

There’s a reason so many of our beginner students, training less than a year, are winning tournaments. It’s the personal attention you get from our top ranked instructors that makes the difference. At UnaBJJ we provide a friendly, supportive, learning atmosphere. We want to make sure you find a BJJ Academy thats fits you.

Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu

Develop your mind as much as your body by learning self-defense and martial arts with our vigorous physical training. Discover who you are!

Muay Thai

Increase your strength, conditioning, and mobility while learning an aresenal of offensive moves. Build your confidence!

Kids Jiu-Jitsu

Learn positive values, reinforce good habits, and self-confidence. In their personal, academic, or career journey, here they learn: Never Give Up!

"Always assume that your oppenent is going to be bigger, stronger, and faster than you: so that you leanr to rely on technique, timing, and leverage rather than brute strength"
Meet Our Instructors

Instructors

At UnaBjj we have one 2nd degree BlackBelt and one 1st degree BlackBelt instructors offering top quality instruction, directly taught by one of the Best Bjj Fighters to come out of Brazil: 5th Degree Blackbelt Master Alexandre Soca Freitas.

Fred Villarica

Owner and Chief Instructor 2nd degree Black Belt

Alonzo Rodriguez

Co-instructor 2nd degree Black Belt

Kevin Enrile

Muay Thai Instructor

Contact Us

We understand that starting BJJ can be intimidating , and new students can feel nervous. Don't worry!, In conjunction to a strong Fundamentals Program, we will work hard to encourage a supportive, learning atmosphere at all times: One Family Environment.
